title: पबजी गेम में कथित तौर पे इस्तेमाल काबा की तस्वीर का सत्य

vclaim: We appreciate your feedback on the Birthday Crate, and we apologize for this oversight. We will redesign the Birthday Crate and release it soon. Thank you for your continued support of PUBG MOBILE.
